description: Having an idea for a product is not enough to be successful in our fast-paced global market. Understanding who your customers are, what the market demands, how your industry works, and where to find resources are critical skills in order to turn an idea into reality. In this course you will discover the secret to turning a business idea into a viable and sustaining product by developing a sound business idea to attract potential investors and clients.
title: Entrepreneurship: Do You Have a True Business Opportunity?
